info.name: FlowMason Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete FlowMason API collection with all 55 pipelines. Generated 2025-12-11T22:35:36.874115

item.name: 4. Execution Status
item.description: Pipeline execution monitoring - use run_id from pipeline run responses

request.description: Get full run details including output. Replace {{run_id}} with actual run ID.

item.name: 5. Demo Pipelines
item.description: 16 demo pipelines. Run a pipeline, then use "Get Run Details" in folder 4 with the returned run_id to check results.

request.description: Returns 202 Accepted with run_id. Copy the "id" from response and use in "Get Run Details" to check results.
Uses the run_id saved from the previous Run Pipeline request. Poll this until status is "completed" or "failed".

item.name: 7. Real-AI Pipelines
item.description: 5 real-ai pipelines. Run a pipeline, then use "Get Run Details" in folder 4 with the returned run_id to check results.

request.description: Returns 202 Accepted with run_id. Copy the "id" from response and use in "Get Run Details" to check results.

body.raw:
{
  "inputs": {
    "document_text": "CONFIDENTIAL AGREEMENT

This Service Level Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into as of January 15, 2025 between 
Acme Corporation ("Provider") and Beta Industries ("Client").

1. SERVICE DESCRIPTION
Provider agrees to deliver cloud hosting services with 99.9% uptime guarantee.

2. PAYMENT TERMS  
Client shall pay $15,000 monthly, due within 30 days of invoice.

3. TERM
This agreement is effective for 24 months from the execution date.

4. CONFIDENTIALITY
Both parties agree to maintain confidentiality of all proprietary information.

Signed: John Smith, CEO Acme Corporation
Date: January 15, 2025",
    "document_type": "legal_contract",
    "extract_fields": [
      "parties",
      "key_terms",
      "dates",
      "financial_terms",
      "obligations"
    ]
  }
}
